name: ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnCredential
desc: A credential that results from a successful single sign-on (SSO) authentication.

items.name: var identityToken: Data?
items.desc: A JSON Web Token (JWT) that securely communicates information about the user to your app.

items.name: var accessToken: Data?
items.desc: An access token used to get an identity token.

items.name: var state: String?
items.desc: An arbitrary string that your app provided to the request that generated this credential.

items.name: var authorizedScopes: [ASAuthorization.Scope]
items.desc: The contact information the user authorized your app to access.

items.name: var authenticatedResponse: HTTPURLResponse?
items.desc: The complete response authentication, including technology-specific values.
